title: Mobile-Based Immigrant Mathematics Vocabulary and Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills and native language literacy (reading/writing)
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance mathematical terminology acquisition and daily communication skills in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Targets non-degree adult learners, focusing on cultivating practical problem-solving abilities.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand and use everyday mathematical terms (e.g., invoices, discount rates, measurement units) in Korean.
Learners can solve context-specific math problems (e.g., budget calculations, distance measurements) three or more times weekly using a mobile app.
Learners can utilize math-related communication expressions with over 80% accuracy through mobile collaborative activities with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
